hadith.text: Abdullah bin 'Amr bin Al-'As said:"A Bedouin came to the Prophet (S.a.w) and said: 'What is the Sur?' He said: 'A horn that will be blown into'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih.
